alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Hole Mountains; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:17PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Line of thunderstorms near Roberts training east toward Rexburg through 615 PM MDT... At 515 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a a line of thunderstorms over Menan extending west that were training east at 15 mph toward Rexburg. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph, pea size hail, periods of moderate to heavy rain, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rexburg, Rigby, Lorenzo, Sugar City, Menan, Teton, Roberts, Lewisville, Parker, Archer, Egin, St Anthony, Plano, Sage Junction, Newdale, Thornton, and southern Saint Anthony Sand Dunes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is possible. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Hole Mountains; Upper Snake River Plain
